title: Define Quantum Key Distribution Protocol for QuantumSecureCommunication Project - Review and Update
description: Investigate and select a robust and well-established Quantum Key Distribution (QKD) protocol suitable for the QuantumSecureCommunication project. Conduct an analysis of the selected protocol's advantages, disadvantages, potential impact on system performance, and provide recommendations for its implementation. Include a comparison with at least two other QKD protocols in the market. Provide a detailed explanation of the chosen protocol's security mechanisms, scalability, and compatibility with existing quantum encryption standards.

title: Design Quantum Encryption Algorithm
description: Design a quantum encryption algorithm for message encoding and decoding.

title: Implement Quantum Encryption Algorithm
description: Code the designed quantum encryption algorithm.

title: Implement Quantum Key Distribution Protocol
description: Code the chosen QKD protocol for key distribution.

title: Test Quantum Secure Communication System
description: Perform extensive testing to ensure the security and functionality of the system.

title: Document Quantum Secure Communication System
description: Write clear and concise documentation for the system.
